summary: Pramod Mishra calls the IDC customer care complaining about a product he bought that came with garbage and is asking for a refund. He is then transferred to the EC number after making a complaint. He is then addressed by Himanshu Mishra who collects all the relevant information about his problem, including a picture of the product and the batch code. Himanshu offers him a refund and asks him to share his address so they can send him a new product. He also asks him to confirm the name and address of the shop where he bought the product. Himanshu ends the call by telling him that he will be contacted by someone from their team and that he should not throw away the product as it might be needed for investigation.
speaker_a_summary: Pramod Mohammad Mishra called the IDC customer care service to report a problem with a packet that he had bought. After checking, the customer care representative confirmed that the problem was damage during production and informed Pramod that he would have to return the packet to the nearest shop in order to get a new one and complete the formal complaint procedure. The representative also requested Pramod to provide the shop's name and address via WhatsApp, in order for the complaint to be registered. The interaction ended with the representative giving Pramod a complaint number.
speaker_b_summary: The narrator is calling to make a complaint about a product they bought, alu bhuji, because it contains rubbish. They bought the product for five rupees and it was supposed to be sugar candy, but it looked and tasted like garbage came out of the packet. They also sent a photo of the product to the company. The narrator is now looking for the EC number to call for customer care to their IDC. They also don't have an address for the product, but they live in Patiyali, near Patiala, in UP. They are looking for a nearby shop address to confirm it. They are also waiting for the company to send them a complaint number.
cohere_points:
- Customer is unhappy with a product he bought and has been trying to get in contact with the company to register his complaint but no one is answering
- Complaint is regarding a contaminated food product
- Caller is asking for a replacement and for the complaint to be escalated
- Agent is trying to get customer's contact information and then will forward the complaint to the relevant department. 
- Agent is also keeping the customer engaged and updating him whilst looking into it. 
- Customer is cooperative but agitated.
